about.visionText: Develop and implement a ministry to carry out the Lord's Great Commission by preaching the Gospel of Jesus Christ to other cultures in the United States and abroad.
about.committeeRoles: Clerk, Secretary, Treasurer, and Other Team Members

suppMission.sentMissionText: Bethel Church send out, after the selection process set by the church, long-term missionaries who will serve for four or more years in the mission fields or mission organizations and short-term missionaries who will serve from six months to four years. Today, Bethel has four long-term missionary families in three mission fields.
suppMission.seniorMissionText: A senior missionary is a short-term missionary with age over 55 who will serve within two years at the mission field. Currently, Bethel has sent out two senior missionary families to two regions.
suppMission.associateMissionText: We support missionaries, including local ministers, who are sent through accredited mission agencies or churches with a strategy and direction that meets the mission policy of Bethel. Today, Bethel support 46 associate missionary families throughout the world.

careNet.body: CareNet is a network between Bethel small groups and missionaries supported by Bethel where each small group is assigned to a particular missionary. It is to promote interest and to cultivate a missional mind through sharing the news of the mission fields and supporting missionaries with prayer and care.
careNet.connectText: To sign up or for more information
